## GridLayout  
> description 该组件把横向均分为12份，每个块级所占宽度百分比为100/12

```
# code

import React,{Component} from 'react';

export default class GridLayout extends Component{
	render() {
		let percent = 100 / 12;
		let { width=12,offset=0,align="left",type="" } = this.props;


		let style = {
			width:Number(width)*percent+'%',
			display:'inline-block',
			// overflow:'hidden',
			float:'left',
			textAlign:align,
			marginLeft:Number(offset)*percent+'%',
		};

		// 如果是存文本内容就会自动的省略文字
		let textCss={
			overflow:"hidden",
			whiteSpace:"nowrap",
			textOverflow:"ellipsis"
		};


		if(type==='text'){
			style = Object.assign({},style,textCss);
		}

		return (
			<div style={style}>
				{this.props.children}
			</div>
		);
	}
}
/**
 * 配合GridLayout组件使用，清除浮动
 */
export class Row extends Component{
	render() {
		let style={
			"clear":"both",
			"overflow":"hidden",
		};
		
		return (
			<div style={style}>
				{this.props.children}
			</div>
		);
	}
}
```

## param

```

width     块级所占用的宽度 1-12

offset    块级偏移位置

align     内容`align`，默认“left”

type      内容区如果纯文本为 “text”，该组件就会自动的添加省略号
```
